item.title: v2.6.1 | Stairway to Heaven
item.description: This is a maintenance release that fixes some issues introduced by the previous release. It also gives more flexibility during the installation to skip providing some email settings. A big thank you to Julius Haake, Alain Devarieux and Nate Curry for reporting these issues. item.title: v2.4.0 | Final Countdown
item.description: This release introduces some new dependencies and database changes. Make sure you follow the minor update documentation to roll out this new version. Read the doc This release introduce the ability for users to select multiple passwords and perform a bulk action such as delete or share. This was a...

item.title: v2.3.0 | Shine On You Crazy Diamond
item.description: We are happy to announce the availability of passbolt directory synchronization feature. With this feature you can add and remove groups and users directly from your OpenLDAP or Active Directory and the changes will be reflected in passbolt. It is currently available as an experimental plugin for Passbolt Pro Edition...

item.title: v2.2.0 | I want to break free
item.description: Please note that Passbolt API V1.x will be officially unmaintained from 1st of September 2018. item.title: v2.1.1 | Loungin
item.description: fig. Passbolt night mode This release introduces a new dark theme that you can use in the place of the black on white default theme. The goal for this theme was to be easier on the eye for people who stare at the screen for a long period of time...

item.title: v2.0.9 | Cold Vein
item.description: This is a maintenance release for passbolt web extension that fixes issues reported by the community. Web Extension Bug fixes Fix content scripts should not be inserted if they are already present. Fix auth pagemod should insert script when a redirection is set in url Fix json.headers should be json.header...

item.title: v2.0.8 | They Reminisce
item.description:
This is a maintenance release for passbolt web extension that fixes issues reported by the community.
Web Extension Bug fixes
Fix backward compatibility issue with search user API v1.

item.title: v2.0.7 | Struggle
item.description: Security notice: Nginx user, please review your configuration file to make sure you are using the correct application root. item.title: v2.0.5 | Everyday struggle
item.description: This is a maintenance for both Passbolt Pro and Community edition. It fixes issues reported by the community such as the vulnerability reported by Matthias vd Meent, considering the use of an unsecure pseudo random number generator when generating passwords. You can learn more about the issue on the dedicated...

item.title: v2.0.4 | Something we all adore
item.description:
This is a maintenance release that fixes issues reported by the community.
Passbolt API Fixed
COMMUNITY-599: Make email MX validation optional and not enabled by default GITHUB-247: Fix secrets are not deleted when deleting a group or a user

item.title: v2.0.3 | Definition
item.description:
This is a maintenance release that improves compatibility with CentOS 7.
Passbolt API Fixed
PASSBOLT-2849: Fix issue with the permissions query and MariaDB 5.5 PASSBOLT-2848: Fix unsafe mode and ssl offloading

item.title: v2.0.1 | Knock You Out
